text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0230 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
A AnesthesiaAnesthesia
P Procedure for treatment (therapeutic, including operations)Procedure for treatment (therapeutic, including operations)
I Invasive procedure not classified elsewhere (e.g., IV, catheter, etc.)Invasive procedure not classified elsewhere (e.g., IV, catheter, etc.)
D Diagnostic procedureDiagnostic procedure

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
ANarkose
PBehandlung
Ioperativer Eingriff
DDiagnosestellung

name: ProcedureFunctionalType
title: procedureFunctionalType
description: Code system of concepts used to classify a procedure.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PR1 segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0230 (Procedure Functional Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Invasive procedure not classified elsewhere (e.g., IV, catheter, etc.)
